Name: Conduits & Accessories
Short_Description: Polycab uPVC Conduits and Fittings provide a reliable and durable solution for electrical installations. Engineered with precision, these conduits ensure secure cable housing while meeting industry standards. Choose Polycab for high-quality uPVC conduits and fittings, offering safety and efficiency in electrical systems.
Full_Description: Polycab Conduits & Fittings High Impact Resistant, Corrosion Free, Flame Retardant Durable and High Impact Resistant | Corrosion Free | Flame Retardant Resistance to Fungal Attacks | Thermal Resistant from – 5°c to + 60°c Fittings Having Brass Insertions | Smooth Finish from Inside, Makes the Pulling of Wire Easier.Polycab is an ISO 9001:2015 certified organization. POLYCAB CONDUITS & FITTINGS are manufactured in accordance with the Indian Standards viz IS : 9537 P3 and IS : 3419 respectively.
